info.author: Matias Guijarro
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU Library or Lesser General Public License (LGPL)
info.description:
A graphical toolkit to build beamline applications. A two layer system
consisting of a *Control Object Server* and a *User Interface* separates the
UI from the underlying control system. The comunication between the two layers
is done through ZeroMQ. The GUI relies on Qt but in the future other graphical
layers (GTK, Web based) could be implemented as well
info.name: Framework4
info.summary: A graphical toolkit to build beamline applications
info.html_description: A graphical toolkit to build beamline applications. A two layer system consisting of a Control Object Server and a User Interface separates the UI from the underlying control system. The comunication between the two layers is done through ZeroMQ. The GUI relies on Qt but in the future other graphical layers (GTK, Web based) could be implemented as well
